title: Azhagendral Lyrics Theeya Velai Seiyyanum Kumaru Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Ranina Reddy, C Sathya
Song: Azhagendral
Music : C. Sathya
Lyrics: Pa Vijay
Movie: Theeya Velai Seiyyanum Kumaru		.
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Azhagendral aval thaana ?
azhagukkey azhagaanaa
aval paartha paarvayiley
azhagaaga thozhaindhena!! (2)

Nee yaaradi en chellamey
un punnagai Â uyir kollumey
oru nodiyil sarindhena
adi manadhil dhinanaa dhinana ..

azhagendraal avaldhaana
sengarudaa oh sengaruda
Ee thikku mukku thakka dhimi yentira
sundharitho nee sundharitho ne
eekka sarigama padha ne sa paadagaa

Oh netrellaam idhupol illai
indru thaan ingu thollao
kaaranam neethaaney

Nanbanai thalla sonnen
thanimayil pesi sendren
ennamo seidhaai needhaaney

oh sanjana!! oh sanjanaa !!
en nenjalaam thandhanaa
un kannil saaindhenaa
oh ...

Oh thevaigal yedhum illai
thedave ondrum illai
endru naan thembaai irundheyney

Dhevadhai unnai kandaen
thaeyilai kannai kandaen
indru en thavarai unardhenay

oh sanjana!! ye sanjanaa !!
en nenjalaam thandhanaa
un kannil saaindhenaa
oh ...

azhagendraal... avaldhaanaEnglish Translation
I tried my best :)
